name: TANK WARS! (ohton_the_knight)
description:
controls 

player 1 controls 

W=move forward S=movebackward

A=turnleft D=turnright

E=shoot Q=put down land mine

player 2 controls uparrow=movefoward downarrow=move backwards

leftarrow=turnleft rightarrow=turnright

/=shoot rightshift=put down land mine
